+Thisira Priyantha hariyata hari brother oya,ada kale godak minissu salli velin thama manussa kama maninne,godak posath minissu dupath manussayawa ganan gannewath na,man dakapu deyak ath vidapu deyak me kiyanne game dane geyak thibba posath geka a gedarata eda duppath higa kana amma kanek bath ekak elluwama me minissu dunne frij ake thiyena parana kama vagayak ane me amma eka diga arala baladdi a kama eka kanna ba,me amma hariyata aduwa,man enna game hamogenma dupath pawla thama api man eka kiyanna lajja vanne na,eth eda a ammata kanna dunne api ape gedara aya kannath kalin ape amma a ammata ada gahala kanna dunna,ara posath minissu danayak dela nolabapu sathuta a ammage kusa ginna niwala api labuwa,a vagema me game posath geka deyak thiyeddi salli kara hama kenatama kiyanawa eth apiwa atha arinawa,a velata godak duka hithenawa,eth ada api eta vada piyawarak ediriyen ennawa mokada duppath unata ape hitha hodai ahinsaka minissunge ashirwadaya jesuge ashirwadaya apita thiyenawa ekai api Dan piyawarak ediriyen inne, man kiyana awasana de Duppath, Posath unath Maranaya Siyallata Podu Deyak,edata kisima bedayak nathuwa sillama valalenne adi 6k harpu valaka pas godak yata,a de minissunta amathaka vela,sry anunge comment ahekata reply karata oyage athta kathwata meka mata kiyanna ona una, god bless you brother
